title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: The scoped type hierarchy is not displayed when pressing F4 on a binary project selection.
EB: I expect the scoped type hierarchy to be displayed when pressing F4 on a binary project selection.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a binary project. 2. Select the project. 3. Press F4.
